name: Checkout: Journey To Employee Of The Month
name_original: Checkout: Journey To Employee Of The Month
description:
Create! Bag! Compete! Squash! Checkout! Work your way up from a humble trainee to the ever sought after prize of Employee Of The Month! Only a select few can win the title - will it be you? Rise through the ranks in a crazy 20-day campaign, earning badges, prizes, and achievements or compete head-to-head against a friend to see who's the better bagger. Earn perks to satisfy both your needs and the customer's, making everyone's day a little easier. Customize your Pudding with unlockable attire or create a completely custom look with fun, easy-to-use player generated content. Test your skills and earn dozens of achievements and prove that you truly deserve the title of Employee of the Month!

  • Create a unique character all your own with playful apron, outfits, hats and costumes.
  • 20 days (no weekends!) of fun and chaos as you work you way up from Trainee to Employee of the Month!
  • Lots to unlock - Perks, custom games, achievements and more!
  • Go online and challenge others players to see who's the better bagger.
  • Create unique content in game content
